content:
The database contains a table named "titanic" with the following columns:

- **PassengerId**: INTEGER
- **Survived**: INTEGER (indicates if the passenger survived)
- **Pclass**: INTEGER (passenger class)
- **Name**: TEXT (name of the passenger)
- **Sex**: TEXT (gender of the passenger)
- **Age**: REAL (age of the passenger)
- **SibSp**: INTEGER (number of siblings/spouses aboard)
- **Parch**: INTEGER (number of parents/children aboard)
- **Ticket**: TEXT (ticket number)
- **Fare**: REAL (fare paid for the ticket)
- **Cabin**: TEXT (cabin number)
- **Embarked**: TEXT (port of embarkation)

If you have a specific question about the data in this table, feel free to ask!
A total of 468 men died on the Titanic.
